kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Delete All Sessions
kw.doc: Removes all the session objects
